snippet: ''Is Your A.T.M. Ripping You Off?'' by David J. Morrow (May 4) discussed the fees assessed to withdraw cash from the nation's automated teller machines. The article drew varied responses from readers.    To the Editor:...
lead_paragraph: ''Is Your A.T.M. Ripping You Off?'' by David J. Morrow (May 4) discussed the fees assessed to withdraw cash from the nation's automated teller machines. The article drew varied responses from readers. To the Editor:
abstract: Rick Rofman letter on ATM charges in California
